Highlight subsets

Highlights subsets made with mmplot_locator on a mmplot object.

mmplot_selection(data, sel)

Arguments

plot

A plot generated by mmplot.
sel

Coordinates of the subset selection of the mmplot.

Value

a ggplot2 object

Examples


data(rocco)

p <- mmplot(data = d, x = "C13.12.03", y = "C14.01.09", log.x = T, log.y = T, color = "essential", minlength = 3000)
p
#> Warning: Transformation introduced infinite values in continuous x-axis
#> Warning: Transformation introduced infinite values in continuous y-axis
#> Warning: Transformation introduced infinite values in continuous x-axis
#> Warning: Transformation introduced infinite values in continuous y-axis
#sel <- mmplot_locator(p)
sel <- data.frame(C13.12.03  =  c(1.39, 2.07, 16.8, 19.4, 7.72, 1.76),
                  C14.01.09  =  c(29.4, 67.6, 85.9, 43.6, 16.7, 14.9))
mmplot_selection(p, sel)
#> Error in FUN(X[[i]], ...): object 'sel' not found
